Sean Rusinko Director, Search Engine Marketing

Sean is responsible for developing the overall strategic direction of Verndaleâ€™s Search Engine Marketing department and ensuring the success of client campaigns. A proven performer in the Search industry, has helped clients across many industries achieve both near-term results and long-term growth though SEM, SEO and SMO strategies. Sean is Google AdWords and Analytics Certified, and is a Yahoo! Search Marketing Ambassador. Sean holds a BS in Marketing and Advertising from Northeastern University.
